value: Shalom Shalom Shalom this is daniel john
lee let's to our restoration ministries
it is the 24th day of the 8p per month
it is november the 27th 2013 this was
the final day of classes for psu before
they break for the thanksgiving paganism
they don't reopen again until monday i
believe some of the students said friday
but i think they were lying to me today
was unbelievable i got there early
because i knew this was going to be the
final day of classes so I wanted to give
myself some extra time so i got there at
it normally my custom has been to get
there at noon but today i got there at
eleven-twenty in the morning and i began
to lift up my voice i began to preach
against atheism and agnosticism i began
to uphold the scientific proofs of the
Roche limit and the redwood trees and
the Oregon Caves to prove the earth is
only 6,000 years there was one woman who
was a geology major and she tried to
tell me that the sediment and the oceans
was fine and I said wait a minute the
sediment the oceans is only a few meters
thick which indicates about 6,000 years
of accumulation if it was billions of
years old like you're saying it would be
way more sediment and she she was
resisting and she became proud so i had
to rebuke her i had to tell her that she
was a contentious woman that she was a
bitch she got really upset and so then
the students called the police and the
crowd got huge i mean i'm talking 250
300 students the crowd was gigantic and
they were really upset that they called
this woman a bitch but she was miami and
jesus christ himself called a woman a
bitch she called the k night woman a dog
and a female dog is a bitch and the
police did come out they didn't do
anything but the crowd was huge like 300
so as I began to preach this giant crowd
i began to exalt somewhat psalm 119
justjust exalting psalm 119 there was so
much that happened today because i was
out there longer than normal i was out
there from 1120 until two p.m.
and I had so many hecklers but also so
many people coming under conviction at
one point there are some little children
that came out and I said you must become
like a little child people were like
Daniel you can't be preaching like this
in front of children and yet they were
bringing up such gross topics like oral
sex and sodomy and homosexuality there
was even a guy signing a petition to
legalize the abomination of
homosexuality I said how dare you bring
this up in front of these little
children of course the students got kind
of ashamed at that point I begin to
rebuke a lot of women who were claimed
to be Christians or claimed to be good
and yet they were dressed like whores I
mean burying their legs burying their
hair a lot of stupid women out today I
were just dumb and I had to finally read
first Timothy to where it says I suffer
not a woman to teach her to usurp
authority over a man that really got
them upset really came against the spear
of feminism today which the spirit of
feminism and female power controls
Oregon so I was able to crack and Pierce
do that by the spirit of Elijah that
consumed me man I don't know what you
guys prayed today but it was powerful
because I mean I've preached at PSU for
13 years but I've never seen the revival
fire hit like it did today I literally
had a Christian who was in opposition to
me and then I allowed him to preach and
he started actually preaching living
holy I had to prod him a few times and I
had to rebuke him I even had to call him
a fool like when Paul called the
Galatians foolish you can't call a
brother in Christ a fool well proved to
me your brother in christ I start
preaching the real gospel because at
first he was saying that we can still
sin and then I pretended to be one of
his hecklers and I said well if you say
that we all sin how about this person he
was like oh and then he started
preaching right and then many of you let
me get back and well he didn't let me
get Matt but I took back the stage and I
started preaching again and you know the
crowd by the end of the day the crowd
had diminished to about maybe a hundred
hundred and fifty but it's still big
there's this one girl please pray for I
don't know her name but every time I
favorite the students her face comes
into my mind because I know y'all was
convicting her she had actually invited
me to come to psu tomorrow she was going
to give me a plate of food but she's
still wicked she she has sex outside of
marriage and she's very wicked so pray
for her there's another girl who admits
that she has oral sex all the time she's
a real
or she's coming under a lot of
conviction because she says Daniel jesus
loves me and I said listen if you know
that God loves you why don't you love
him and then I began to emphasize this
as I begin to start preaching I said all
of you students I hear say that you know
God loves you well how about you start
loving God what about Yahweh what about
Yahshua what about his Commandments what
about it is Torah what about keeping his
Sabbath day and wearing his zeit zeit
and doing the things he says to love
your neighbor to love yah to give your
tied to the portion widows what about
Yahweh what about God what about making

to exalt the blood atonement and the
cross like never before and there was a
one suit named Harley he actually
followed me back to my car he was a
little troubled by my harsh method but
there were tears in his eyes I hope he
comes to skype this was the most awesome
way to end this the the time I have PS
you before they close from the
Thanksgiving break I told them not to
keep Thanksgiving that's wicked because
it started off pure with Sue cope with
an Abraham Lincoln shifted it to the
next month and just like that evil king
and Israel did and do not participate do
not have turkey tomorrow do not

course the students got offended by that

so much I love them so much that I will
tell them that they are wicked and that
they need to repent and it was an
awesome day awesome day thank you for
